C L N S 

C

ConcurrentSingleton - Annotation Type in net.peierls.guiceutil
Apply this to implementation classes when you want only one instance (per Injector) to be reused for all injections for that binding, and you want to eagerly create the instance concurrently in the background with other singletons in this scope.
ConcurrentSingletonScope - Class in net.peierls.guiceutil
A special form of singleton scope that eagerly starts building its singletons concurrently in background using a thread pool at injector creation.
configure() - Method in class net.peierls.guiceutil.SingletonScopesModule
 

L

LazySingleton - Annotation Type in net.peierls.guiceutil
Apply this to implementation classes when you want only one instance (per Injector) to be reused for all injections for that binding, and you want to create the instance lazily.
LazySingletonScope - Class in net.peierls.guiceutil
A special form of singleton scope that won't eagerly produce an instance even when the Stage is PRODUCTION.

N

net.peierls.guiceutil - package net.peierls.guiceutil
Guice utilities

S

scope(Key<T>, Provider<T>) - Method in class net.peierls.guiceutil.ConcurrentSingletonScope
 
scope(Key<T>, Provider<T>) - Method in class net.peierls.guiceutil.LazySingletonScope
 
SingletonScopesModule - Class in net.peierls.guiceutil
Install LazySingletonScope and ConcurrentSingletonScope.
SingletonScopesModule() - Constructor for class net.peierls.guiceutil.SingletonScopesModule
